sub_title: I am looking for a new challenge where I can spread my knowledge and experience with people and company´s.
summary:
2009 - 2018 A. Hak International BV.
Construction of pipelines and installations in the Oil & Gas industry.
Project director / sales director Middle East.
• Projects acquired in Iraq and KSA.
• Responsible for the ME region.
• Managing 1000-1500 men over 4 projects.
• Annual turnover of 100-125 Million Dollar.
2005 - 2009 Commodore NV.
Manufacturer of mobile equipment for music and film.
COO operations director and board member.
• Responsible for all hardware and software.
• Content and contracts for films and music.
2000 - 2005 Wisseloord studios in Hilversum.
Largest Dutch studio for music recordings.
Shareholder and director.
• Managing and renting music studios to Dutch and international artists for album and TV recordings.
• Setting up a database for artists in collaboration with Buma Stemra (advocacy of copyright).
• Setting up the company Yearonimo being the first in the Netherlands to broadcast live football (premier league) paid through the internet.
1990 - 2000 A. Hak Industrial Services BV.
International company specialized in inspection services in Oil & Gas and Chemical Industry
Managing Director.
• Overall management at home and abroad.
• Expanding the company from 15 people to 210 people.
• Turnover in the year 1990 was 2 million in the year 2000 the turnover was 62 million Euro.
• Business established in Europe, Germany, France, Italy, England and Spain.
• Outside Europe business was developed in South Africa and USA (Houston).
• New inspection techniques released and designed and put on the market.
1977 - 1990 Groenpol / GTI Rotterdam and The Hague.
Electrotechnical installations in buildings and factories.
Project Manager.
• started in 1977 as an assistant mechanic
• Study to first mechanic
• Internal trainings for draftsman, planner, ass. project leader and project leader.
• As project leader
• Projects value for technical installations 50 million guilders
• Responsible for implementation and 200 people.

company.name: A. Hakpark / A hak International B.V.

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the Middle.East to get pipeline projects for A Hak.
Project Director for 2x 48" pipelines in Iraq at FAW Island near Basra.
Project Director for Hak at Shell  form Majoon oilfield till Zubair oilfield valve stations and T-inns on the 32 " main pipeline for all oil productions in Iraq.
Project Director for Hak on the flowline 28"  and HDPE water l pipelines for Weatherford in Iraq.
Project Director on Fase 3 in Iraq at FAW Island 1x 48" pipeline.
Setting up JV with local companies in the Middle East
profile_positions.title: Director Business Development and Project Director.

profile_positions.description: Working in China to get product for USA company  software and hardware development done
profile_positions.title: Board member {COO}
